macro instruction extensions of compiler languagesmacroinstruction compilers constructed froma small set of functions can be made extremely powerful in particular conditional assembly nesteddefinitions and parenthetical notation serve to make a compiler capable of accepting verygeneral extensions to its ground language.cacm april 1960mcilroy m d.ca600406 jb march 22 1978 1:49 pm205 4 205205 4 205210 4 205214 4 2051982 4 205398 4 205642 4 205669 4 205100 4 205123 4 205164 4 2051 5 205205 5 205205 5 205205 5 2051358 5 2051565 5 2051781 5 2051788 5 20543 5 205123 6 205196 6 205919 6 205990 6 2051006 6 2051007 6 2051007 6 2051046 6 2051131 6 2051139 6 2051140 6 2051149 6 2051162 6 2051198 6 2051215 6 2051223 6 2051265 6 2051303 6 2051323 6 2051358 6 2051358 6 2051366 6 2051421 6 2051455 6 2051460 6 2051460 6 2051462 6 2051463 6 2051467 6 2051468 6 2051477 6 2051491 6 2051496 6 2051531 6 2051535 6 2051565 6 2051601 6 2051602 6 2051613 6 2051614 6 2051626 6 2051641 6 2051787 6 2051788 6 205205 6 205205 6 205205 6 205205 6 205224 6 205249 6 205288 6 205316 6 205381 6 205398 6 20511 6 205404 6 205410 6 205463 6 205464 6 205483 6 2053184 6 2053184 6 2053188 6 2053189 6 205584 6 205600 6 205680 6 205691 6 205729 6 205763 6 205799 6 205799 6 205
